attributes.action: For the government to have a national referendum on assisted dying.
attributes.background: Following the assisted dying vote, on such an important social issue it would seem right to ask the opinion of citizens of the uk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

We are petitioning for a National Referendum on Assisted Dying
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701838
